notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: LM designed the study, carried out the histological experiments, and wrote the manuscript. CBL designed the study, carried out the IP-One ELISA and calcium assays, and wrote the manuscript. MM carried out the radioactive assay. VL generated the P522R variant. PC contributed to the IP-One and calcium experiments. YA and TL contributed to histological experiments on human tissue. MK contributed to the study design and the manuscript preparation. JB contributed to the study design and coordination. PC participated in the study design. TEG conceived the study and participated in its design and coordination. PJW conceived the study, participated in its design and coordination, and helped to draft the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
